metadata.synopsis: A welcoming one-shot AD which the alchemist wendor plays when the player enters his shop.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Wyrm's Crossing Bridge, enter the alchemist shop -16; 51; 137

0.speaker: Stylin' Horst
0.text: Now here's someone who appreciates the finer things! Welcome, saer.
